name: Rappi
headline: On-demand delivery and financial services for Latin America.
description: Rappi is a mega high growth, Series B, consumer tech StartUp looking to be the everything store of Latin America. We are a marketplace that connects users who want to purchase prepared foods, groceries, clothes, and more with contractors who fulfil them. Think of Rappi as a Doordarsh meets Delivery meets Instacart. We are venture backed by top VCs in the world including Sequoia, DST, Andreessen Horrowitz and YCombinator. Management consultant skills are highly valued and one of the founders and three of the company's top leaders are former top tier management consultants. We are across Argentina, Brasil, Mexico, Colombia and are aggressively growing in these markets and all throughout LatAm.

founders.name: Sebastian Mejia, Founder
founders.description: Rappi founder. Rappi is the category leader in e-commerce + delivery across Latin America. Rappi has played an essential role in the transformation of the tech ecosystem in the region. Builder at heart and investor in +100 companies.

generated_description:
**Company Overview: Rappi**

Founded in 2015, Rappi is a fast-growing consumer tech startup based in Bogot√°, Colombia, operating across major Latin American markets including Argentina, Brazil, Mexico, and Colombia. The company's mission is to provide on-demand delivery and financial services, effectively making it a one-stop shop‚Äîthink of it as a hybrid of DoorDash, Uber Eats, and Instacart, but tailored for the diverse needs of Latin America.

### Business Model
Rappi functions as a marketplace connecting users looking to purchase everything from prepared meals to groceries, clothing, and more with local contractors who fulfill these requests. This expansive reach is complemented by support from some of the world‚Äôs top venture capitalists, including Sequoia, Andreessen Horowitz, and Y Combinator, where Rappi was part of the W16 batch.

### Team and Culture
With a workforce of approximately 4,800 employees, Rappi values management consulting skills among its team, which includes top leaders with backgrounds in prestigious consulting firms. Dalton Caldwell serves as the group's partner, highlighting the strategic guidance involved in the company‚Äôs operations.

### Market Position
Rappi is not just about food delivery; it seeks to be the "everything store" for Latin America. The app features popular chains like McDonald's, Starbucks, and KFC alongside local restaurants, creating a platform that benefits consumers, restaurants, and delivery drivers alike. Currently, the company is expanding its services across the region, tapping into a market ripe for innovation and convenience.

### Conclusion
In a nutshell, Rappi is poised to redefine the delivery landscape in Latin America by combining technology, convenience, and a broad service range. As it continues to grow and evolve, the platform is not just about delivering food; it's about delivering possibilities. For more information, check out their website at [Rappi](http://www.rappi.com).
